name: [Falconerd] Big Pixel Style
description:
This LoRA is made specifically for anime-style people, but will also work with some scenes and objects.

Great for Visual Novels or any pixel art games in which you may display character avatars while talking (Fire Emblem, etc).

Please leave a review if you find it useful or if you find a problem! Cheers!
Official YouTube Channel: [CLICK HERE]

Ko-Fi [CLICK HERE]

meta.prompt:
1girl, white_hair, long_hair, wolf_ears, wolf_tail, blue_eyes, large_breasts, dynamic_pose, action_shot, foreshortening, pilot_suit, smiling, flat_color
<lora:big_pixel_style:1>
meta.negativePrompt: (cropped:1.1), (cartoon, 3d, bad art, poorly drawn, close up, blurry:1.2), (bad anatomy, bad hands:1.1), error, missing fingers, abstract, mangled, kitsch, oversaturated, greain, mangled, surreal, long neck, long body, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, (malformed hands:1.0), blur, out of focus, deformed, blurry, bad anatomy, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutation, mutated, extra_limb, ugly, (poorly drawn hands:1.2), two heads, gross, mutilated, disgusting, horrible, scary, evil, old, conjoined, lowres, text, frame, low quality, normal quality
